title: What’s the Status of Class Action Lawsuit on Tesla Full Self Driving?
description:
Despite covering Tesla closely for almost a decade and a half, some stories sneak through. I thought Tesla had “gotten away with it” up until now in regards to very misleading marketing and claims around Tesla “Full Self Driving” and it surprised me that there had never been any significant ... [continued]

The post What’s the Status of Class Action Lawsuit on Tesla Full Self Driving? appeared first on CleanTechnica.
